title: Stock Rally Wavers at End of Best Week in a Month | Bloomberg Markets: Early Edition 12/26/2025
description: Paul Sweeney and Caroline Hyde host "Bloomberg Markets," tracking the market's wavering push for a year-end rally, the US strike on Islamic State targets in Nigeria and a recap of the holiday shopping season. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Paul Sweeney and Caroline Hyde host "Bloomberg Markets," tracking the market's wavering push for a year-end rally, the US strike on Islamic State targets in Nigeria and a recap of the holiday shopping season. (Source: Bloomberg)
